body: -- once promoted as the city's next gated community -- just over the East New York border in Lindenwood, Queens. It is made of green-painted particleboard and tattered black tarp lashed to a chain-link fence. There is a gate, and there are stones, some of which may indeed be cobbles in the dictionary sense of water-worn rocks. But there is not much
title: LINDENWOOD JOURNAL; Eight Undeveloped Acres And Secret Videotapes Figure in Official's Trial
